name: DELETED:1624 Avoid undocumented Package Procedures and Functions
description: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Package Procedures and Functions
output:
This report lists all Functions with no documentation.
It provides the following information: Procedure or Function Name, Procedure or Function Full Name
remediation: Enrich Artifact code with meaningful comments
